text: Richard Sherman, a prominent NFL voice on social-justice issues, spoke to The Chronicle about the positive changes in the league since the killing of George Floyd sparked outrage, protests and a national conversation about racism. @Eric_Branch story. https://t.co/4KrXtgxik0
